, filtering records where there are mismatches in expected net changes and where certain conditions on billing periods and amounts are met.

: Ensure that only authorized users have access to this view, as it contains sensitive billing information.
: The view includes financial data, which should be protected according to organizational data governance policies.
: Implement role-based access controls to restrict view access to users who need it for validation and auditing purposes.
